name: CryptoHunk Market Platform
description:
Welcome to CryptoHunk, the #1 Cryptocurrency Market Platform in the world!

Everyone wants to be rich, it's the only thing that matters in this world, and with our market-leading-cryptocurrency-generating-algorithm, you might achieve our your dreams in a matter of minutes.

Forget family, friends, and ethical concerns, you're here to make money. and for the low, LOW price of $99,999.99 you will get a subscription to our premium service.

Just download our platform below, sit back, and watch as the dough rolls in!

WARNING: Our payment service is down at the moment due to a pending litigation from the IRS. Please refrain from downloading the application in the meanwhile (Failure to comply WILL result in legal actions).
